attributes.action: REFORM PRISONS, REARRANGE PRISONS BY TAKING INTO ACCOUNT RECENTLY INTRODUCED HOMOSEXUAL COUPLE MARRIAGE LAW
attributes.additional_details: We must rearrange our customs and values to reflect the changes brought by the new law which recognize homosexual relationship as marriage. This new recognition brought great injustice to straight people in prisons. Consequence of Homosexual couple marriage law breaches straight couple’s Human Rights Article 8 “Right to Respect Private and Family Life”. Homosexual people can set up relationship in prisons, they can touch each other, they can love each other, this give them great pleasure, and keep their moral up this amounts establishment private and family life in prison. On the other hand straight people are separated from the opposite sex, they can not touch each other, they can see each other, this makes their moral collapse, they also can be subjected to sexual molestation by homosexual people. We must end this great injustice. Prisons must be reformed; there should be prison for gay women, and for gay man, another separate prison for mixed sex straight people.
